item.title: Mashed Potatoes
item.description: Cook the peeled, chopped potatoes (1.5kg) in salty water, 15-20 minutes. Mash the potatoes. Melt ~100g butter. Stir it into the potatoes. Heat up 1 cup of cream, and add aromatics (2-3 cloves of garlic) Stir the cream into the the potatoes in small batches.
